Are you in search of a reliable Linux VPS host?

FastNext.com are a team of creative and inventive professionals who do their best to develop new hosting solutions as well as provide fabulous quality service. Our mission is to make web hosting affordable while providing our customers with outstanding support as well as a fast and reliable network, thus giving them a taste of fast hosting! Our datacenter is located in Clifton, New Jersey, just 14 miles from New York City. It is outfitted with high-end equipment allowing us to provide the service we guarantee that we can provide. We can boast of enormous growth potential allowing us up to 55,000 sq ft of pure datacenter floor space.

We are offering SPECIAL NOW!!! HURRY UP - Time-limited Offer!!!

Advantages:
1) Customizable - You have full root access to your VPS whenever you need. We give you full control and access to the server.
2) New high-performance SSD drives - Data is hosted and stored on RAID-10 arrays built of high-performance SSD drives.
3) 24/7 Technical support - We will transfer your website for free and will consult on any settings/preferences you need for your websites. Our support team is available by phone, chat and ticketing system round-the-clock, 365 days a year.
4) Guaranteed resources - We use KVM virtualization on our servers which makes overselling impossible.
5) Backups - You can not worry about your data as we generate backups on everyday basis. You can contact us anytime and we`ll restore any of your files or databases.

If you have any questions, feel free to CONTACT US!
